title: Uchiage Hanabi, Shita Kara Miru Ka? Yoko Kara Miru Ka?
alternative_title: 打ち上げ花火、下から見るか？横から見るか？ (Japanese); 烟花 (Chinese); Fireworks, Should We See it from the Side or the Bottom?; Skyrockets, Watch from Below? Watch from the Side? (English)
status: 打ち上げ花火、下から見るか？横から見るか？ (Japanese); 烟花 (Chinese); Fireworks, Should We See it from the Side or the Bottom?; Skyrockets, Watch from Below? Watch from the Side? (English)
description:
Description :
        The story is set on one day during summer vacation. It follows a group of boys who try to view a fireworks display from the town lighthouse to see if they look round or flat when viewed from the side. Meanwhile, one of the boys, Norimichi, receives an invitation from his crush Nazuna to run away with her.

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 4 : At The Summer Festival, Who Will She See The Fireworks With?
Chapter 3 : The Shape Of The Ascending Fireworks At The Display Is…?
Vol.1 Chapter 2 : The Swimming Race Of Fate Starts!
Vol.1 Chapter 1 : When The Fireworks Ascend, The Miracle Of Love Happens.
